mapper.select: SELECT a.type, a.PLAN_HEAD_ID, b.MAT_ID, c.CP_name, b.deta_qt, b.good_qt,a.plan_due_date, TO_char(b.START_DATE, 'yyyy-MM-dd') AS start_date, TO_char(b.END_DATE, 'yyyy-MM-dd') AS end_date, b.MEMO FROM PROD_PLAN a left JOIN DETA_PROD_PLAN b ON a.PLAN_HEAD_ID = b.PLAN_HEAD_ID left JOIN COMPLETE_PROD c ON b.MAT_ID = c.CP_ID ORDER BY a.PLAN_HEAD_ID
